alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 23 at 8:06PM PDT until further notice by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following county, Esmeralda. * WHEN...Until 1115 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in normally dry washes. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 806 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms moving repeatedly over the area around Silver Peak leading to heavy rainfall. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Silver Peak and Silver Peak Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
